name: Unsustainable connection
description:
You will eventually get disconnected. Just don’t press the power button and we can skip all of this… 

Look… just to avoid spending too much time on this, you can try, I will switch it off again and we can go on with our lives. Sounds good?

Controls
  • Press the power button
  • Avoid my attempts to switch it back off
  • You can damage anything that has a health bar by (left) clicking on it.
  • You can drag and drop the button (when it’s on) holding the right mouse button.
Other
  • You can switch on/off the music and sfx at the right pannel.
  • You can use toggle on/off the “easier” mode using the checkbox at the bottom left of the screen.
  • During the tutorial there might be some tips on the chat-box.
